title: billingAccountInformation
description: A billing account information to set up a new billing account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the billing account information.

link.description: A self referencing link to the order.

billingAccount.description: Identifies the billing account to which the recurring and non-recurring charges for this request will be billed.

billingContact.description: Identifies the information of the person or office to be contacted on billing matters.

billingContactAddress.description: Identifies the address of the person or office to be contacted on billing matters.
